I'm not committed to a Republican candidate, Colin Powell told CNN Chief Political Correspondent Candy Crowley .`` I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates and finally see who the two candidates are who are going for this position.''``

The change in command seemed long overdue to longtime Silicon Valley analyst Rob Enderle . Whenever you have a caretaker CEO, they're supposed to stay in place until the founders have enough experience, he said.`` Larry had enough experience about four years ago.''
